verses.verse: Now when <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H2204>reached<s%> <S%H2204>old<s%> <S%H3117>age,<s%> he <S%H4427>made<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
And he <S%H622>gathered<s%> together <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8269>leaders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites.<s%>

And the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> were <S%H5608>numbered<s%> from <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> and their <S%H4557>number<s%> by <S%H1538>census<s%> of <S%H1397>men<s%> was 38000.
Of <S%H428>these,<s%> 24000 were to <S%H5329>oversee<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> and 6000 [were] <S%H7860>officers<s%> and <S%H8199>judges,<s%>

and 4000 [were] <S%H7778>gatekeepers,<s%> and 4000 [were] <S%H1984>praising<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> with the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> David <S%H6213>made<s%> for <S%H1984>giving<s%> <S%H1984>praise.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H2505>divided<s%> them into <S%H4256>divisions<s%> according to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi:<s%> <S%H1648>Gershon,<s%> <S%H6955>Kohath,<s%> and <S%H4847>Merari.<s%>
Of the <S%H1649>Gershonites<s%> [were] <S%H3936>Ladan<s%> and <S%H8096>Shimei.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3936>Ladan<s%> [were] <S%H3171>Jehiel<s%> the <S%H7218>first<s%> and <S%H2241>Zetham<s%> and <S%H3100>Joel,<s%> <S%H7969>three.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> [were] <S%H8013>Shelomoth<s%> and <S%H2381>Haziel<s%> and <S%H2039>Haran,<s%> <S%H7969>three.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> were the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the fathers' [households] of <S%H3936>Ladan.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> [were] <S%H3189>Jahath,<s%> <S%H2126>Zina,<s%> <S%H3266>Jeush,<s%> and <S%H1283>Beriah.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> [were] the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8096>Shimei.<s%>

And <S%H3189>Jahath<s%> was the <S%H7218>first,<s%> and <S%H2125>Zizah<s%> the <S%H8145>second;<s%> but <S%H3266>Jeush<s%> and <S%H1283>Beriah<s%> did not have <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> so they <S%H1961>became<s%> a father's <S%H1004>household,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6486>class.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> were <S%H702>four:<s%> <S%H6019>Amram,<s%> <S%H3324>Izhar,<s%> <S%H9116>Hebron<s%> and <S%H5816>Uzziel.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6019>Amram<s%> were <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses.<s%> And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> was <S%H914>set<s%> <S%H914>apart<s%> to <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> him as <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy,<s%> he and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5704>forever,<s%> <S%H5769><s%> to <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> to Him and to <S%H1288>bless<s%> in His <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>
But [as for] <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> were <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H5921>among<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> [were] <S%H1647>Gershom<s%> and <S%H461>Eliezer.<s%>
The <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1647>Gershom<s%> [was] <S%H7619>Shebuel<s%> the <S%H7218>chief.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H461>Eliezer<s%> was <S%H7345>Rehabiah<s%> the <S%H7218>chief;<s%> and <S%H461>Eliezer<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> but the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7345>Rehabiah<s%> were <S%H4605>very<s%> <S%H7235>many.<s%>
The <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3324>Izhar<s%> was <S%H8019>Shelomith<s%> the <S%H7218>chief.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H9116>Hebron<s%> [were] <S%H3404>Jeriah<s%> the <S%H7218>first,<s%> <S%H568>Amariah<s%> the <S%H8145>second,<s%> <S%H3166>Jahaziel<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> and <S%H3360>Jekameam<s%> the <S%H7243>fourth.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5816>Uzziel<s%> [were] <S%H4318>Micah<s%> the <S%H7218>first<s%> and <S%H3449>Isshiah<s%> the <S%H8145>second.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> were <S%H4249>Mahli<s%> and <S%H4187>Mushi.<s%> The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4249>Mahli<s%> [were] <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and <S%H7027>Kish.<s%>

And <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> and <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> but <S%H1323>daughters<s%> <S%H518>only,<s%> so their <S%H251>brothers,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish,<s%> <S%H5375>took<s%> them [as wives.]
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4187>Mushi<s%> [were] <S%H7969>three:<s%> <S%H4249>Mahli,<s%> <S%H5740>Eder,<s%> and <S%H3406>Jeremoth.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> according to their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%> [even] the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the fathers' [households] of those of them who were <S%H6485>counted,<s%> in the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8034>names<s%> by their <S%H1538>census,<s%> <S%H6213>doing<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward.<s%>

For <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has <S%H5117>given<s%> <S%H5117>rest<s%> to His <S%H5971>people,<s%> and He <S%H7931>dwells<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>

"And <S%H1571>also,<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> will <S%H369>no<s%> longer need to <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H3627>utensils<s%> for its <S%H5656>service.<s%>"

For by the <S%H314>last<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> [were] <S%H4557>numbered,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward.<s%>

For their <S%H4612>office<s%> is to <S%H3027>assist<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> with the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> in the <S%H2691>courts<s%> and in the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> and in the <S%H2893>purifying<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6944>things,<s%> even the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%>

and with the <S%H3899>showbread,<s%> <S%H4635><s%> and the <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a grain <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H7550>wafers,<s%> or [what is baked in] the <S%H4227>pan,<s%> or what is well-mixed, and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4060>measures<s%> of <S%H4884>volume<s%> and <S%H4060>size.<s%>
And they are to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H1242>every<s%> <S%H1242>morning<s%> to <S%H3034>thank<s%> and to <S%H1984>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H3651>likewise<s%> at <S%H6153>evening,<s%>

and to <S%H5927>offer<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offerings<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> on the <S%H7676>sabbaths,<s%> the <S%H2320>new<s%> <S%H2320>moons<s%> and the <S%H4150>fixed<s%> <S%H4150>festivals<s%> in the <S%H4557>number<s%> [set] by the <S%H4941>ordinance<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> them, <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

Thus they are to <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> and <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, and <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> their <S%H251>relatives,<s%> for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
